directions: Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium heat. Add onion, ginger and garlic; sauté until onion is soft, about 10 minutes. Add apple, then flour, curry powder and cumin; sauté 3 minutes. Gradually whisk in broth. Add cider, cream, chutney, cilantro and tomato paste. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer until mixture thickens, about 20 minutes. Add turkey; stir until heated, about 2 minutes. Spoon curry over rice.
ingredients: 1 tart green apple, cored, peeled, chopped
title: Quick Turkey Curry
